titles.title: To provide for a continuation of the mission of the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Kerrville, Texas, including the maintenance of acute care beds at that medical center.
To provide for a continuation of the mission of the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Kerrville, Texas, including the maintenance of acute care beds at that medical center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: States that the Secretary of Veterans Affairs: (1) may not implement a change in the mission of the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Kerrville, Texas; and (2) shall continue to maintain a minimum of 25 acute care beds there.
